author: The Independent
title: Ground News - Lord Cameron warns of Iran’s ‘malign influence’ and global threat
text:
Summary by The Independent The former prime minister described Hamas , the Houthis and Hezbollah as ‘proxies’ for Iran and said they are contributing to an ‘extremely high’ level of ‘danger and insecurity’ around the world Share menu More
